nodes.text: Geiz was a male Human Sergeant of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Imperial forces under Darth Marr. In the area around the Temple of Sacrifice Geiz asked a fellow Coalition member to assist him in eliminating local predatory wildlife.
Sergeant Geiz appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
